 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֵׂעִיר‎</span> **proper name** ==Se\`îr== (= <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂעִיר‎</span>, ***goat ?*** compare [[BDB#Gray|Gray]]<sup>Prop.N.94</sup>; but note play in <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֵׂעָר‎</span> [[Gen.25.25|Gen 25:25]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂעִר‎</span> [[Gen.27.11|Gen 27:11]]; [[Gen.27.23|Gen 27:23]] [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG xl (1886). 165; Ency. Bib. ii. 1183</sup> compare proper name, of a mountain <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (the 'hairy,' i.e. 'well-wooded,' compare <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***trees***), proper name, of a people (originally proper name, of a location) <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 92</sup> thinks <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂ‎</span> originally proper name, masculine, but land much earlier in OT.; perhaps = Tel Amarna land <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***Šêri***</u></abbr>, [[BDB#Zim|Zim]]<sup>ZA vi (1891), 257</sup> [[BDB#Jastr|Jastr]]<sup>JBL xi (1892), 114</sup> [[BDB#Wkl|Wkl]]<sup>Tel Am. 181, 26</sup> [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]<sup>Edom. 28. f.</sup>); — 

**1.** <span class="bdbLangGreek">Σηειρ</span>: **a. terr.** ==land of Edom, south of Dead Sea==, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַ֫רְצָה שׂ‎</span> [[Gen.32.4|Gen 32:4]] ([[BDB#J|J]]; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׂדֵה אֱדוֺם‎</span>), compare [[Gen.36.30|Gen 36:30]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂ‎</span> alone [[Judg.5.4|Judg 5:4]] (poem; \|\| ***id.***), [[Num.24.18|Num 24:18]] ([[BDB#J|J]] [[BDB#E|E]]; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֱדוֺם‎</span>), [[Deut.1.44|Deut 1:44]]; [[Deut.2.4|Deut 2:4]]; [[Deut.2.8|Deut 2:8]]; [[Deut.2.12|Deut 2:12]]; [[Deut.2.22|Deut 2:22]]; [[Deut.2.29|Deut 2:29]]; [[Deut.33.2|Deut 33:2]]; [[Josh.11.19|Josh 11:19]] ([[BDB#D|D]]), [[Isa.21.11|Isa 21:11]]; [[2Chr.20.23|2Chr 20:23]] b; with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ה‎</span> locative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֵׂעִ֫ירָה‎</span> [[Gen.33.14|Gen 33:14]]; [[Gen.33.16|Gen 33:16]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Josh.12.7|Josh 12:7]] ([[BDB#D|D]]). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** specific **mont.** ==East of Arabah==, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַרשֿׂ‎</span> [[Josh.24.4|Josh 24:4]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Gen.36.8|Gen 36:8]]; [[Gen.36.9|Gen 36:9]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[Deut.1.2|Deut 1:2]]; [[Deut.2.1|Deut 2:1]]; [[Deut.21.5|Deut 21:5]]; [[Ezek.35.2|Ezek 35:2]]; [[Ezek.35.3|Ezek 35:3]]; [[Ezek.35.7|Ezek 35:7]]; [[Ezek.35.15|Ezek 35:15]]; [[1Chr.4.42|1Chr 4:42]]; [[2Chr.20.10|2Chr 20:10]]; [[2Chr.20.22|2Chr 20:22]]; [[2Chr.20.23|2Chr 20:23]] compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַרֲרָם שׂ‎</span> [[Gen.14.6|Gen 14:6]] (home of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַחֹרִי‎</span>; on text see [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]<sup>Edom. 28</sup> [[BDB#Gunk|Gunk]]<sup>Gn</sup>). **c. of a people** [[Ezek.25.8|Ezek 25:8]] = Edom [[[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span>]; but strike out [[BDB#B|ᵐ5]]<sup>B</sup> [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#Co|Co]] [[BDB#Berthol|Berthol]] Toy [[BDB#Krae|Krae]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **d.** personified as **masculine** in <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּנֵישֿׂ‎</span> (see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֹרִי‎</span> p. 360; compare [[Gen.14.6|Gen 14:6]]) [[Gen.36.20|Gen 36:20]] = [[1Chr.1.38|1Chr 1:38]]; [[Gen.36.21|Gen 36:21]] ([[BDB#P|P]]; + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּאֶרֶץ אֱדוֺם‎</span>); = Edomites [[2Chr.25.11|2Chr 25:11]]; [[2Chr.25.14|2Chr 25:14]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֱדוֺמִים‎</span>). 

**2. mont.** ==in Judah==, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַרשֿׂ‎</span> [[Josh.15.10|Josh 15:10]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), <span class="bdbLangGreek">Ασσαρ</span>, [[BDB#A|A]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">Σηειρ</span>, [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]]<sup>L</sup></lookup> <span class="bdbLangGreek">Σιειρ</span>; [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]<sup>G 91</sup> and others compare hill-ruin ***Sârîs*** approximately 9 miles west of Jerusalem. ([[BDB#Rob|Rob]]<sup>BR iii. 156</sup>).
